title: Infectious diseases and natural body defenses
brief_description: Uses photomicrography, laboratory demonstration, and animation to illustrate the two groups of natural body defences which guard the body against disease. Explains the outer body defences including the skin, passages of the nose and throat, and stomach acids. Among the inner body defences are lymph glands, the chemical antibodies, spleen, liver and while blood cells.
